ISSUE.TITLE: Conflicting module versions groovy-all

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Added .netflixoss config file to tell our jenkins job to use JDK8 for build, but compile to java 7 compatability.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #131 from alexpanov/1.x Fix issue #129, bump groovy-all version Looks fine to me.
